body_html: I'm also struggling with similar issues. I see that the Estimator framework includes experimental support for multiple "Heads" which will probably address this particular issue. There is paper on Arxiv that includes a section on Heads: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1708.02637.pdf. However, the document is just an outline, and the details are still unclear to me.
